title: conferred on him by section 42 (inserted by section 10 of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited road traffic (licensing drivers) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: conferred on him by section 42 (inserted by section 10 of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 2. Regulation 41 of the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 41 of the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 
2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006) shall apply during the period beginning on the 
coming into operation of these Regulations and ending on 31 July 2020, 
subject to the modification that paragraph (1)(d) of that Regulation shall not 
operate or have effect during that period. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
 “Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [86] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the 
Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport, 

20 March, 2020. 

SHANE ROSS, 

Minister for Transport, Tourism 
and Sport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [86]

title: conferred on him by section 42 (inserted by section 10 of the Road Traffic Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 
2006 to provide that persons of 70 years or older (except those with an 
identified/specified illness) applying for a learner permit or driving licence do 
not need to submit a medical report with their application during the period 
beginning on the coming into operation of these Regulations and ending on 31 
July 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [86] 5
